nodes.title: üëë Pixaroma - Note - (Episode 69)
widgets_values:
# MODELS & NODES USED IN THIS WORKFLOW 
### Make sure to download all required models and install the custom nodes before running this workflow.

---

## üü´ WanVideo Model Loader
Download **LongCat_TI2V_comfy_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled_KJ.safetensors** from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LongCat-Video_comfy/resolve/main/LongCat_TI2V_comfy_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled_KJ.safetensors?download=true)

Or if you have more than 24GB VRAM download **LongCat_TI2V_comfy_bf16.safetensors** from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LongCat-Video_comfy/resolve/main/LongCat_TI2V_comfy_bf16.safetensors?download=true)

üìÅ **Place in:** `ComfyUI/models/diffusion_models`  

More info about models [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LongCat-Video_comfy/tree/main)

---  

## üü´ WanVideo Lora Select
Download **LongCat_distill_lora_alpha64_bf16.safetensors** from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LongCat-Video_comfy/resolve/main/LongCat_distill_lora_alpha64_bf16.safetensors?download=true)   

üìÅ **Place in:** `ComfyUI/models/loras`  

More Loras [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LongCat-Video_comfy/tree/main)

---

## üü´ Load VAE  
Download **wan_2.1_vae.safetensors** from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/vae/wan_2.1_vae.safetensors?download=true)  

üìÅ **Place in:** `ComfyUI/models/vae`  

---

## üü´ WanVideo TextEncode Cached
Download **umt5-xxl-enc-bf16** from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/ALGOTECH/WanVideo_comfy/resolve/main/umt5-xxl-enc-bf16.safetensors?download=true
)  

üìÅ **Place in:** `ComfyUI/models/clip`  

---

## üß© Nodes Installed from Manager  

- **ComfyUI-WanVideoWrapper**
- **ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite**
- **rgthree-comfy**
- **ComfyUI-KJNodes**

## üìö Resources  
üé• **Tutorials:** [Pixaroma YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@pixaroma)  
üí¨ **Community Discord:** [Join Here](https://discord.com/invite/gggpkVgBf3)
the woman picks up the mug with both hands and takes a slow sip of coffee
the woman lifts the spoon from the mug and sets it on the table, Her movements are natural
the woman place the cup on the table and smiles to the camera
a black cat walking into frame from the side, jumping onto the table next to the mug. The woman looks at the cat with surprise and a gentle smile.
the woman take her hand from the mug and reaches out to pet the cat, smiling warmly as the cat relaxes beside her

nodes.title: Remove or Disconnect this Node if you Get Torch Errors¬†
Blocks_to_swap info
widgets_values:
‚öôÔ∏è blocks_to_swap (0‚Äì48)
 - Controls how many model blocks
   are swapped (offloaded) to CPU.
 - Higher = uses LESS VRAM, but slower.
 - Lower = uses MORE VRAM, but faster.

üí° Rule of Thumb:
 - 0 ‚Üí All on GPU (fastest, high VRAM)
 - 20‚Äì30 ‚Üí Balanced (good for 16GB)
 - 35‚Äì48 ‚Üí Max offload (for low VRAM)

If you get OOM ‚Äúout of memory‚Äù errors,
increase this value.
If it runs too slow, lower it.
